name: The Rust-Cathedral
notable_features: Towering spire made of fused scrap metal
Altar that hums with residual radiation
Ancient industrial machinery repurposed for rituals
exploration_notes: Players will find scavenged tech modified for occult purposes, journals detailing the cult's descent into madness, and hidden caches of pre-war energy cells. The upper spire offers a vantage point over the toxic marshes, but is heavily guarded.
